content: introducing granny s heart a delightful fusion of traditional craft and heartfelt design handmade with care each square combines cozy texture with a touch of whimsy making it perfect for a variety of projects whether you re creating a sentimental blanket a cozy pillow or a heartfelt gift these squares add a personal and loving touch make them in a range of colors as they are perfect for customizing to your own color scheme or for using up those treasured scraps of yarn bring a bit of love into your crafting with these adorable heart-centered granny squares they re sure to make your projects extra special
